problem_names:
lemma tauPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "\<tau>.(P) \<approx> \<tau>.(Q)"

lemma inputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   x :: name

  assumes PSimQ: "\<forall>y. P[x::=y] \<approx> Q[x::=y]"
  
  shows "a<x>.P \<approx> a<x>.Q"

lemma outputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "a{b}.(P) \<approx> a{b}.(Q)"

lemma resPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name
  
  assumes PBiSimQ: "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "<\<nu>x>P \<approx> <\<nu>x>Q"

lemma matchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "[a\<frown>b]P \<approx> [a\<frown>b]Q"

lemma mismatchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "[a\<noteq>b]P \<approx> [a\<noteq>b]Q"

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<approx> Q \<parallel> R"

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes PBisimQ: "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "!P \<approx> !Q"
